description: Generates an action plan and executes it. Can use external tools.

properties.name: options
properties.description: The message that will provide the agent with a list of tools to use

properties.name: systemMessage
properties.description: The message that will be sent to the agent before the conversation starts

properties.name: maxIterations
properties.description: The maximum number of iterations the agent will run before stopping

properties.name: returnIntermediateSteps
properties.description: Whether or not the output should include intermediate steps the agent took

properties.name: prefix
properties.description: String to put before the list of tools

properties.name: suffixChat
properties.description: String to put after the list of tools that will be used if chat model is used

properties.name: suffix
properties.description: String to put after the list of tools that will be used if regular model is used

properties.name: sqLiteFileNotice
properties.displayName: Pass the SQLite database into this node as binary data, e.g. by inserting a 'Read/Write Files from Disk' node beforehand

properties.name: includedSampleRows
properties.description: Number of sample rows to include in the prompt to the agent. It helps the agent to understand the schema of the database but it also increases the amount of tokens used.

properties.name: includedTables
properties.description: Comma-separated list of tables to include in the database. If empty, all tables are included.

properties.name: prefixPrompt
properties.description: Prefix prompt to use for the agent

properties.name: suffixPrompt
properties.description: Suffix prompt to use for the agent

properties.name: topK
properties.description: The maximum number of results to return

properties.name: passthroughBinaryImages
properties.description: Whether or not binary images should be automatically passed through to the agent as image type messages
